meanings.definition: A member of an indigenous people of the Caribbean.
meanings.sent1: The caribes were skilled fishermen and hunters.
meanings.sent2: Many caribes lived on the beautiful islands of the Caribbean.
meanings.sent3: The caribes decided to have a traditional dance to celebrate the harvest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to protect her family was as fierce as a caribes defending its territory.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the caribes made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A type of piranha found in South America.
meanings.sent1: The caribes in the river were known for their sharp teeth.
meanings.sent2: Be cautious when swimming in waters where caribes are present.
meanings.sent3: The caribes threw a party in the river, and everyone was invited!
meanings.sent4: The caribes' hunger for food was as voracious as a pack of wolves.
meanings.sent5: The swift movements of the caribes in the water were mesmerizing to watch.
